description:
This is a franchise opportunity for one individual who will be awarded the region of Miami Florida, USA area as the local Sales Geek.

Sales Geek is one of the UKs best, and fastest growing; Sales Training, Consultancy, and providers of Part-time/Fractional Sales Directors in the UK and USA.

This role is to join an organisation as a franchisee, incorporate your own business and which requires an upfront investment. You will operate part of an area of Miami by delivering Sales Geeks products and services, from fractional sales leadership and training to the SME market in this city.

Who are Sales Geek? Established in 2017, Sales Geek is a British born organisation that has created an award-winning business model which will provide you with all the tools and support you need to build a unique and phenomenally successful business to service clients in your chosen area. Since 2023, we have launched our first Sales Geek Florida Franchisor who, if successful will support you throughout your business journey; We are seeking only the highest standards when it comes to becoming a 'Geek'. We will only accept the top sales professionals who can demonstrate their historical skills and capability as sales leaders, we will fill in the rest.

Opportunity description

Hiring a Sales leader is a big deal for any company, particularly for small or medium-sized businesses, it is critical that they get it right. A Sales Director’s salary can be prohibitive, particularly if they want the absolute best sales leaders with significant experience and a great track record in sales growth; Usually, the most talented sales professionals end up in large corporate organisations, typically being paid a salary beyond the reach of most businesses. The work you will do will transform your client’s sales operations and the people within it and behind them.

Using our flexible – ‘consume what you need’ – model, you will act as their VP of Sales / Sales Director. You will have access to all the Geeks in the background and our HQ team who are all available to support you in various disciplines, from people training to e-Commerce, Marketing, Strategy, Process and Development, and beyond.

For most businesses, it usually means 1-3 days per month. For others, you could be working with them once a week or more. A typical contract length is 6-12 months and beyond.

In addition to your earning potential with the "Your Sales Director" AND "Your Sales Trainer" services, Sales Geek also offers a series of online, digital, and supplementary services that you could choose to make additional income from. These include:

· The world's first, and only Free Online App service specifically for sales and leadership.

· Online Training Academy

· White Labelled SaaS applications

· Specialist courses covering a range of subjects

· Facilitated Sales Team Training Course

Help us to change the way the world perceives Sales, and build your own story with our support, and we roll out Sales Geek Services throughout UK Australia, USA and rest of the world...

Reach out to the HQ team, download the prospectus and hopefully you will be the lucky geek to be awarded and work directly for the business community in Miami
